About the Investor
People First
I've been in the tech business my whole life and have a strong focus on human capital. For what reason? My many years of experience in building medium and large enterprises have led me to a clear perception that business is about people more than it is about money. That's exactly why I strive to support entrepreneurs in growing ambitious projects

Explore Biography
A Snapshot

Murat Abdrakhmanov

Murat Abdrakhmanov's journey from the classrooms of Kazakhstan Polytechnic University to the boardrooms of global ventures is a saga of relentless ambition and visionary leadership.

His narrative is rich with innovation, from pioneering Kazakhstan's telecom revolution to championing healthcare breakthroughs and steering startups towards global acclaim, all while navigating the high seas as a yachting enthusiast and championing the cause of children in need.

Foundational Beginnings
Murat Abdrakhmanov's journey from the academic corridors of Kazakhstan Polytechnic University and Fuqua School of Business has been a humble yet profound path towards realizing the impactful synergy between innovation and genuine leadership. His foray into the realms of technology, healthcare, and beyond has always been driven by a simple yet powerful belief in the potential of people to make meaningful change.
Building Bridges in Telecommunications

The inception of ASTEL marked the beginning of Murat’s endeavor to connect communities, demonstrating his commitment to creating value through thoughtful innovation. His stewardship at KazTransCom, leading to a strategic exit in 2020, reflects a dedication to nurturing and guiding ventures towards sustainable growth.

Expanding Horizons

Murat's ventures into healthcare with Dent-Lux and Medical Park clinic, and his pioneering efforts in the fitness industry with FITNATION, showcase his versatility and a deep-rooted desire to enhance quality of life for many. His journey is marked not by the pursuit of success for its own sake, but by a vision to serve and improve communities.

Investing in the Future
Murat Abdrakhmanov's investment philosophy is deeply rooted in a vision for a sustainable and innovative future, marked by four significant milestones:
01
Chocofamily's Phenomenal Growth
Spearheading Chocofamily, Kazakhstan's premier internet holding, Murat played a crucial role in its ascent to a $220 million turnover in 2019. His strategic foresight and unwavering support were instrumental in navigating the venture through the evolving digital landscape, setting a benchmark for e-commerce success in the region.
02
Strategic Partnerships in GENESIS and JIJI
As a co-investor in GENESIS, an innovative Ukrainian holding, and JIJI, a leading marketplace in Nigeria, Murat has demonstrated a keen eye for identifying and nurturing platforms with the potential for significant social and economic impact. These investments underscore his commitment to fostering entrepreneurship and innovation on a global scale.
03
Advancements in IoT with OrionM2M and Faceplate
Leading the investments in OrionM2M and Faceplate, Murat has contributed to the advancement of the Internet of Things (IoT) technology. By supporting these ventures, he has facilitated the development of solutions that enhance connectivity and efficiency across various industries, showcasing his dedication to technological innovation.
04
Empowering HR Solutions
Through investments in HR-messenger and Skyworker Ukraine, Murat has impacted the human resources sector by streamlining recruitment and employee management processes. These ventures reflect his understanding of the critical role efficient HR solutions play in the growth and sustainability of businesses.
Commitment to Making a Difference
Beyond his professional achievements, Murat Abdrakhmanov’s personal endeavors reflect a profound dedication to societal well-being:
Yachting and Leadership

An avid yachtsman, Murat's qualification as a Yachtmaster Offshore is more than a personal achievement; it symbolizes his leadership qualities and love for adventure. He applies the lessons from the seas – resilience, quick decision-making, and teamwork – to his entrepreneurial and philanthropic efforts.

Philanthropy through DOM MAMA

Perhaps most indicative of Murat's commitment to making a difference is his support for the DOM MAMA project. This initiative has dramatically reduced child institutionalization in Kazakhstan by 65% over five years, offering a model of how focused, compassionate efforts can lead to substantial societal change. Through DOM MAMA, Murat has not only provided financial support but also actively engaged in awareness and advocacy efforts, demonstrating a hands-on approach to philanthropy.
